name: CVE-2021-4178
description: A arbitrary code execution flaw was found in the Fabric 8 Kubernetes client affecting versions 5.0.0-beta-1 and above. Due to an improperly configured YAML parsing, this will allow a local and privileged attacker to supply malicious YAML.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:5.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:5.0.0:beta1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fabric8-kubernetes:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:process_automation:7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:openshift_application_runtimes:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:descision_manager:7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:integration_camel_k:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:a-mq_streams:2.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:fuse:7.11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:integration_camel_quarkus:2.2.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:build_of_quarkus:2.2.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
